description:
Turn any table into a tune-up bench for your cross-country skis. Support points hold your boards stable for waxing and base prep. An infinitely adjustable base, stainless steel binding holder and push-button locking mechanism keeps you set up stable and easy to work with.

  • Locking mechanism releases ski with the push of a button
  • Pivoting support points automatically adjust to the ski's camber
  • Soft rubber pads are durable, non-marking and non-slip
  • Compatible with all bindings
  • Light, compact design is portable for travel
name: Tools4Boards Compact XC Travel Vise
